hero.info: Hi, my name is João and I am a Junior FullStack Developer based in Torres Vedras, Portugal. 📍

about.title: A Junior FullStack Developer based in Torres Vedras, Portugal.📍
about.subtitle: About Me
about.text: As a Junior Fullstack Developer, I strive to continue learning and growing in the field. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. I am professional, responsible, and dedicated. I would like to join a talented team and contribute my knowledge to the company's success. I am confident that I can be an asset!

port.title: My most challenging projects 👀
port.subtitle: Portfolio
port.omni: Website for a fictional company called Omnifood that sells meal subscriptions.
port.sebas: Final project of the FullStack Developer Course by CodeMaster. Website of the writer Sebastião Alves.
